GUI structure

Following help find class responsible for specific GUI features.

Game view

Whole game looks like:

 +--------------------------------------------+
 | MainMenu                                   |
 +--------------------------------------------+
 |                                            |
 |                                            |
 |                                            |
 |                MainPanel                   |
 |                                            |
 |                                            |
 |                                            |
 |                                            |
 |                                            |
 |                                            |
 +--------------------------------------------+
 | StatuBar                                   |
 +--------------------------------------------+

MainPanel

MainPanel have following structure:

 +---------------------------------+----------+
 |                                 |          |
 |                                 |          |
 |                                 |          |
 |          GamePanel              | RighPanel|
 |                                 |          |
 |                                 |          |
 |                                 |          |
 |                                 |          |
 |                                 |          |
 |                                 |          |
 +---------------------------------+----------+
